attributes.description:
Own this Beautiful one Owner Kia Picanto,Finance is available ,Trade ins Welcome and Nationwide delivery. ABS, Aircon,  Air bags, Alarm, Electric Windows, Radio
BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our Valued customers. For Excellent Service Contact our Sales Manager - Barend Conradie As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully fledged automotive dealer group offers New cars, Used Cars, Parts and service to all existing and potential customers. With us you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience
